globals.title: Angular
globals.description: Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications
globals.keywords: Angular, AngularJS, AngularDart, Javscript, Dart, Framework, JavaScript MVC, Google

raul.name: Raúl Jiménez
raul.bio: I’m a web developer with 15 years of experience currently working as a front-end architect and consultant in Barcelona. My expertise covers AngularJS, JavaScript, HTML5/CSS3, ActionScript and Media Streaming. I’m passionate about cross-platform applications, devices and screens and I’m trying to make the web better with my project Videogular.

sergi.name: Sergi Gimeno

talk.title: Typescript & Angular 2
talk._description: An overview on the upcoming release of AngularJS written in Typescript 1.5, a superset of ES6 language.

sergi.bio: I am a Javascript developer and passionate of web technologies. I've been working in mobile and desktop applications made with JS for 5 years and collaborated with several local startups. Always trying to learn more about technology and programming. I also play guitars and love beer.
